definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: In E coli, DNA polymerases are key enzymes involved in two distinguished pathways contributing to untargeted mutagenesis.
sentences.chinese: 可诱导的DNA聚合酶在其中起到了关键作用。

sentences.english: Preparation and identification of the thermostable DNA polymerase expressed in E.
sentences.chinese: 耐热DNA聚合酶在大肠杆菌中得到表达。

sentences.english: The fundamental mechanism of transcription is conserved among cellular RNA polymerases, the researchers explained.
sentences.chinese: 转录的基本机制就存在于进化保守的RNA聚合酶中。

sentences.english: Telomerase is an RNA-dependent DNA polymerase.
sentences.chinese: 端粒酶是一种RNA依赖的DNA聚合酶。

sentences.english: Different DNA polymerases and ligases are used to complete the separate pathways.
sentences.chinese: 不同的DNA聚合酶和连接酶被用来完成分离途径。

sentences.english: Human polymerase eta(Pol eta) is one of translesion synthesis DNA polymerases.
sentences.chinese: 是一种跨损伤合成DNA聚合酶。

sentences.english: How far along the DNA would the transcription "bubble" formed by RNA polymerase move in 10s?
sentences.chinese: RNA聚合酶形成的转录泡在10秒内可以移动多远？

sentences.english: Function of DNA polymerase I in prokaryotes.
sentences.chinese: 原核生物中DNA聚合酶I的一种功能。

sentences.english: The template specificities found with DNA polymerases from human leucocytes is summarized in Table 1.
sentences.chinese: 人白血病DNA聚合酶的模板特异性简列于表1中。

sentences.english: Component of prokaryotic RNA polymerase holoenzyme.
sentences.chinese: 原核生物RNA聚合酶全酶的组成成分。

sentences.english: The cells of GM chickens make this fake polymerase.
sentences.chinese: 转基因鸡的细胞能产生这种假聚合酶。

definition: single chain/refers to RNA as opposed to the double helix DNA
base pairing (e.g. adenine A 腺嘌呤 pairs with thymine T 胸腺嘧啶 in DNA)/base pair
cytosine nucleotide (C, pairs with guanine G 鳥嘌呤|鸟嘌呤 in DNA and RNA)

pinyin: tuo1 yang3 he2 tang2 he2 suan1
